Identity.History: Small crab like creatures that wander around bodies of water, groups of Ampilus tend to mind their own business until their dens are threatened. There are rumors that some are able to channel electrical current much like Zora Mages. Ampilus Crabs can be found wandering along the Lanayru Coast. Their shells are particularly valuable.
